texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Minutes of meetings with sponsors: Department for Transport and Transport for London. Part A meetings are held with sponsors only, Part B have Crossrail Limited attendees. Appropriate redactions have been applied where necessary in line with FOI requirements."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
